description: Juicy chicken thighs and sweet, slowly cooked capsicums and onions make a light but delicious Italian dish.
name: Chicken Peperonata Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Reduce the heat to a simmer and cook for 12-14 minutes until the chicken is cooked through. Scatter with parsley and serve.
